title: T212 Obak's - looking to buy a few
author: 3-2-count

posts.post_title: T212 Obak's - looking to buy a few
posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy some T212 Obak's. Raw or graded is acceptable. 

I'm thinking presentable cards in good to vg condition would suffice!

Please drop me a PM or just post here what you may have available. 

Thanks all,
Hi Tony, I have a nicely conditioned Hosp in SGC 3.5 with backstamp.  $130 venmo friends or $135 pp gs includes shipping.  Please pm if interested.  Bob I.
